info.description: HLE debug commands. Available only after emulation has been started.

usage:
Syntax: syms <string> OR syms *
<string> is the first occurance of symbol to find.
* - list all symbols (possible overflow of message buffer).
Examples of use: syms ma
                 syms __z
                 syms *
See also: name savemap loadmap addmap

Syntax: name <addr> <symbol>
give name to function or memory variable (add symbol).
Example: name 0x80003100 __start
See also: syms savemap loadmap addmap

Syntax: savemap <file> OR savemap .
. is used to update current loaded map.
path can be relative
Examples of use: savemap .
                 savemap Data\my.map
See also: name loadmap addmap

DumpThreads.info: Some games freeze in one of the threads, polling something. If you look from the debugger, the context switches back and forth and it is difficult to catch such moments. Dumping current Dolphin OS threads will simplify the task.

usage: You must be sure that the address you provide is a pointer to the context, otherwise you will get garbage.
display: 1 - show on screen, 0 - return only serialized context (do not show). Default value is 1.
DumpContext.output: Array [ UInt32 gpr[32], Float fpr[32], Float psr[32], UInt32 gqr[32], UInt32 cr, UInt32 lr, UInt32 ctr, UInt32 xer, UInt32 fpscr, UInt32 srr0, UInt32 srr1, UInt16 mode, UInt16 state]  (see OSContext struct)

UnloadMap.help: Unload map and clear all symbols

LoadMap.help: Unload map and load new one

usage: If the Map file is not loaded, it loads the specifed Map and makes it current, instead of adding.
